MdePkg/Include/Protocol/Reset.h File Reference


Defines

#define EFI_RESET_ARCH_PROTOCOL_GUID   { 0x27CFAC88, 0x46CC, 0x11d4, {0x9A, 0x38, 0x00, 0x90, 0x27, 0x3F, 0xC1, 0x4D } }

Variables

EFI_GUID gEfiResetArchProtocolGuid

Detailed Description

Reset Architectural Protocol as defined in PI Specification VOLUME 2 DXE

Used to provide ResetSystem runtime services

The ResetSystem () UEFI 2.0 service is added to the EFI system table and the EFI_RESET_ARCH_PROTOCOL_GUID protocol is registered with a NULL pointer.
